home.title: The Brighter Tomorrow Map
home.sub_title: Connecting people going through difficult times with the free resources available nearby, and to the people who want to offer them support living in their local community

section_titles.0: How does the Brighter Tomorrow Map work?
section_titles.1: What can I do to support people living on the streets near me?

sub.0: On the map, you can post and search for all the free resources available in your local community, which people who are homeless, or going through hardship, need to meet their basic needs and take steps towards improving their situation to build a brighter tomorrow
sub.1: The map gives you two options.  Firstly; you can zoom in on your city and print a map of the resources available, to give out to anyone you meet who is in need. Secondly; Add resources you'd like to offer to those in need. something like a CV help workshop, teaching a skill or intro, materials and advice to someone interested in starting a career in your industry, or just meeting to buy them a tea and share a friendly chat
sub.2: Focallocal - Local Action for Global Change. We built this map - We are an open community of people taking local action, all around the World. Focallocal aims to hit at the roots of issues within our societies; by ignoring politics and simply uniting people in positive action, we empower people to take ownership of issues you want to see improved in your local community and together create positive activities and projects to achieve a change

section_titles.3: 4. How can someone find the resource
section_titles.4: 5. Offering a Resource? How will people recognise you? (otherwise just click next)

sub.3: Be as specific as possible. Next to a statue? North, West of a bridge? Not sure? Check Google Earth
sub.4: Carrying a Teddy Bear on your Shoulder? Wearing a bright yellow hat? wearing a Focallocal badge or T-shirt?

subs.0: 'Choose category' enter a resource you've found
subs.2: 'Offer a resource' to offer something to support people nearby who are homeless
subs.1: 'Suggestions' see ideas for what you can offer

text.2: Join the Global Movement, become a Positive Action Hero and take action for Positive Change where you live right now, at www.focallocal.org
